explains: vt. 旋开；旋松；从……旋出螺丝

sentences.en: I can't unscrew the lid of this jar.
You'll have to unscrew the handles to paint the door.
sentences.cn: 要漆这扇门，你得把螺丝拧开，缷下门把手。

sentences.en: If you unscrew it, it actually looks like a Siamese twin bulb, with two bases and one head.
sentences.cn: 如果你拧开它，它看去真的就像连体孪生灯泡，有两个基座，两个灯头。
